column7: We can probably get rid of this
You have a white space here
Mixin capitalized here, but not in previous sentence. Keep consistent
"queries that will be replaced"... Sentence kind of confusing. reword/break up.
bullet point make sense it is a long process, involving different steps, which is not in this case,

Potentially use bullet points to describe dir.

Similar to https://github.com/openstack/horizon/blob/master/doc/source/quickstart.rst towards the bottom under "Structure"
This review patch has been abandoned. Should we update this with the other proposal which was mentioned by Henry in https://review.openstack.org/#/c/348562/
thanks for pointing out I am gonna remove this
we should also mention that names of modules should use singular form for nouns. port.py not ports.py.
Don't call get_port separately, that will make this even more expensive with lots of queries. Once the relationship is referenced, it's safe to use.
